_gram:

{#mArjayizyatite, mArjituM-mArzwuM, mArjayituM, mfzwa, marjita#} {%<ab>desid.</ab>%}

_meanings:
{@--1@} To wipe or
wash off, cleanse, clean, sweep clean
(<ab>fig.</ab> also); {#svedalavAnmamArja#}  
<ls>Śi. 3. 79</ls>, {#dozapravAdamamfjat#} <ls n="Śi.">5. 28.</ls>

{@--3@} To make smooth, curry
(as a horse).
